thread.title: Police: Employee arrested for dealing drugs in Bennington state
thread.title_full: Police: Employee arrested for dealing drugs in Bennington state - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Police: Employee arrested for dealing drugs in Bennington state
text:
BENNINGTON, Vt. - Authorities say someone was dealing drugs in a state office building in Bennington.
Authorities tell WCAX a state employee was arrested Monday morning in Bennington. No name was released yet but more details are expected to be released later Monday.
Both local police and members of the Vermont State Police Drug Task force are involved in the investigation. WCAX will have more information as it becomes available.
